titles.title: To designate the facility of the United States Postal Service located at 11805 Chimney Rock Road in Houston, Texas, as the "Lee P. Brown Post Office Building".

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Government Reform.

bill.summary: 11/6/2003--Introduced. Designates the U.S. Postal Service facility located at 11805 Chimney Rock Road in Houston, Texas, as the Lee P. Brown Post Office Building.
